My Projects

A collection of the projects I've worked on over the years. Some are live in production, others used to be, while most never were.

Projects

8
    2023

    Outline Solutions

    My consulting brand focused on developing software to simplify complex business processes and workflows.
    2022

    PCT Live

    A personal website that documented my journey along the 2650 mile Pacific Crest Trail, showcasing real-time location updates, photos, and detailed logs. Employed Nextjs to create a website that maximizes the use of existing data sources, offline functionalities, and efficient caching layers to account for the unique limitations involved.
    2022

    Search Engine

    A proof-of-concept search engine with an emphasis on querying trusted sources.
    2022

    Recipe Joiner

    A no nonsense social recipe platform.
    2022

    Help Genie

    When the world needs our help we often wonder how. Help Genie is for discovering and sharing ways to help each other. Born in response to the developing Ukrainian Russian conflict.
    2021

    AllPage

    A platform to create, curate, and control the digital things that are important to you.
    2021

    Solidmark

    Solidmark is a bookmark manager built with the Solid Protocol in place of a traditional database. The primary objective of this project is to show how one might implement Solid into an existing codebase to increase data ownership.
    2020

    Tracker

    A simple 'track anything' app.
